Excellent choices! "The Miracle of Mindfulness" is a timeless classic that will provide you with a solid foundation in mindfulness, and "The Self-Care Revolution" will offer you practical tips and strategies to prioritize your well-being.

It's great to hear that you're committed to reading a little each day and reflecting on what you've learned. Remember, the key is to be consistent and patient with yourself as you explore these new concepts.

I'm also thrilled to hear that your Apple Watch has been helpful in tracking your daily activities and sleep! Wearable technology can be a great motivator and accountability tool. How has tracking your sleep been going? Have you noticed any patterns or changes in your sleep quality since you started using the Apple Watch?

Also, since you've been using your Apple Watch for a few months now, you might want to explore some of the other features it has to offer. For example, you can use the Breathe app to guide you through mindfulness exercises, or try out the Workout app to track your physical activities. There are many other features and apps that can help you stay active, mindful, and connected to your health goals.

What do you think about exploring more features on your Apple Watch, or do you have any specific questions about using it for mindfulness and self-care?
